examples: The book describes her life from cradle to grave.
But the lawyers also described internal politics that at times slowed down the department's work or drove a wedge among members of the team.
And after the match, the Carlisle boss wasn't pulling his punches when describing his players' performance.
BBC is falling over backwards to be impartial by describing this as a crowd!
It was described as a large, luxury mobile home, but there was barely room to swing a cat.
words.defineEn: to give details about someone or something to say what they are like
words.defineVi: để cung cấp thông tin chi tiết về một ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó để nói họ như thế nào

examples: This business method takes the risk of failure out of the table.
Adults were also at risk from epidemics.
Any investment involves an element of risk.
All personal belongings are left at the owner’s risk.

words.defineEn: the possibility of something dangerous or unpleasant happening in the future; a situation that causes danger or problem
words.defineVi: khả năng xảy ra điều gì đó nguy hiểm hoặc khó chịu trong tương lai; một tình huống gây ra nguy hiểm hoặc vấn đề

examples: A dangerous policy that runs the risk of failure.

The student kept procrastinating on their assignments and projects, and eventually learned the hard way that delays are dangerous when they failed their exams.
words.defineEn: capable of harming or injuring a person or destroying or damaging a thing
words.defineVi: có khả năng làm hại hoặc làm bị thương một người hoặc phá hủy hoặc làm hỏng một thứ

examples: The path continued over rough, rocky ground.

examples: As a home remedy, I steeped lemongrass in hot water and drank it to relieve a sore throat.

words.defineVi: (của một bề mặt) có độ dốc hoặc góc nhọn, gây khó khăn cho việc leo lên hoặc đi lên
